## Section 6: Spacing & Layout Tokens ### 6.1 Spacing Scale (8pt Grid System) | Token | Rem | Pixels | Tailwind | Common Use Case | |-------|-----|--------|----------|-----------------| | **0** | 0 | 0px | `p-0`, `m-0` | Reset spacing | | **1** | 0.25rem | 4px | `p-1`, `m-1`, `gap-1` | Micro spacing, tight gaps | | **2** | 0.5rem | 8px | `p-2`, `m-2`, `gap-2` | **XS spacing** | | **3** | 0.75rem | 12px | `p-3`, `m-3`, `gap-3` | Badge padding, tight padding | | **4** | 1rem | 16px | `p-4`, `m-4`, `gap-4` | **Standard padding/margin** | | **5** | 1.25rem | 20px | `p-5`, `m-5`, `gap-5` | SM-MD
